Commentary.ab: Y19.5a, Y19.5c anapiiūxδa anapišūta] analyzed by Bartholomae as loc. sg. of anapiiūxδi- and anapišūti-, but anapiiūxδanąm anapišūtanąm as adj. anapiiūxδa- and anapišūta-; cod. mostly with false cut in both cases ana.°.
Y19.5b gāϑanąm] Kellens, 2010 p. 30 as glossa of raϑβanąm.
Y19.5c ańiie ratauuō] nom. for acc. if we accept paiti with acc. for the expression of equivalency (Bartholomae, 1904, p.827).

Parallels.ab: hā.mē baγa ahunahe vairiiehe ~ Y19.3 baγa aēša ās ahunahe vairiiehe; ~ Y19.6, Y19.7, Y19.21 baγąm ahunahe vairiiehe; ~ Y20.5 baγąm aṣ̌ahe vahištahe; ~ Y21.5 baγąm yeŋ́hē.hātąm; ~ Y55.7 baγąm staōtanąm yesńiianąm.
